name: Restaurant Al Achab Medina
review: This food is for angels. Experience innoubliable chez al achab à tanger.

name: Restaurant Ahlen
review: Terrific tagine in Tangiers. I recommend the fish soup and the lamb.

name: Alma Kitchen Coffee
review: Good veggie brunch. Excellent food and accommodating to gluten-free diners.

name: Restaurant Al Maimouni
address: The entrance of Tangier's Medina, Morocco.
review: Attentive personal, high level of service and really authentic dishes.

name: Mozzarino
review: I go there often for the cheap prices, high quality, friendly staff and the quick service.

name: Olivier Restaurant
address: Km 19.8, National Road Tangier-Assilah, Tangier, Morocco.
review: Added to that, chatting with Ali and Tariq who were so helpful and lovely.

name: Restaurant Palais Zahia
review: Delicious food and fairly priced. Highly recommend the tajine and the chef’s special.

name: La Vue
review: Amazing view with great food. Best place for a sunset dinner.

name: RR-ice
specialty: fresh seafood, traditional Moroccan dishes, and ice cream
review: Offers a pleasant beachfront ambiance with mixed reviews on its food quality and service.

name: Restaurant L'Ocean
review: Location, food quality, ambiance are just perfect.

name: Restaurant Vandalucia
review: Warm welcoming and the meal was finished off with a fruit platter and traditional mint tea.

name: DarHarruch
review: Chicken tortilla, chicken ravine and beef couscous, all were delicious!

name: Restaurant Antartique Tanger
address: 109 Avenue ben Abi Zaraa Braness, Tangier, Morocco.
review: The best seafood I ever had! Best seafood restaurant so far.

name: Restaurant Kebdani
review: Best birthday celebration ever!! Great place and staff.

name: Le Pti Versailles
review: Wonderful service. Just a beautiful restaurant!
